title: Is this laptop good?
body:
I want to buy a new laptop for school and my friend plays LoL on this:http://www.ebay.com.au/itm/like/311126032864?limghlpsr=true&hlpv=2&ops=true&viphx=1&hlpht=true&lpid=107&chn=ps 
Is it good for LoL and other games in general? Tf2, Minecraft etc.
Thanks!

P.S Yes i know that desktops are better but i need a laptop for school and i move houses a lot so a desktop isnt too practical.

replies.body: this is a great laptop i have it and it runs all those games fine
not bad at all, i had the GT 720M in my old laptop, worked for league well, 8gb ram is nice and its an i5, good value for money

Mean while on mac, 60fps at maximum graphics levels. If all you want it for is school, Minecraft, TF2 and LoL, then I would highly recommend a Mac. I run a MacBook Pro 11" retina display on OSX Yosemite, and the graphics are amazing, the speed is amazing, and the connectivity to my iPhone is amazing. Best thing on the market imo.
It might get 50-60 fps in LoL. and It might get 60 fps in TF2. Assuming you turn graphics settings to low on both games.
